description.@en: The movement of the stars has affected us so. I’ve seen the horrors that have been wrought by humankind’s hand, and the vault of night will foretell of our doom . . .

data.notes: Grievous Injuries must undergo a successful Perform Surgery within twenty-four hours of suffering it, or else a character gains its related Permanent Injury.

effect.@en: Whenever you fail to Resist Stress, Fear or Terror, you temporarily reduce your Initiative and Movement by -3. This lasts until you get a good night’s rest.
